content:
From: Gerwin.Klein@data61.csiro.au
The AFP is now available for Isabelle2018.

With the new release, a number of new entries from the development version have become available from the front page on https://www.isa-afp.org/

  • Von-Neumann-Morgenstern Utility Theorem
    by Julian Parsert and Cezary Kaliszyk
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Neumann_Morgenstern_Utility.html

  • Partial Order Reduction
    by Julian Brunner
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Partial_Order_Reduction.html

  • CakeML
    by Lars Hupel and Yu Zhang
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/CakeML.html

  • Gromov Hyperbolicity
    by Sebastien Gouezel
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Gromov_Hyperbolicity.html

  • The Masonâ€“Stothers Theorem
    by Manuel Eberl
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Mason_Stothers.html

  • Operations on Bounded Natural Functors
    by Jasmin Christian Blanchette, Andrei Popescu, and Dmitriy Traytel
    https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/BNF_Operations.html

The AFP now contains ~1,960,700 lines of proof in 428 articles by 291 Authors.

Enjoy!
Gerwin
